definition: few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom

sentences.english: Right. I have witnessed some applications that in fact rarely or never throw exceptions.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我知道有些應用程序極少或從來不會拋出異常。

sentences.english: The absorbing amount of nutriment and laminarin from kelp by eating directly by humankind is very little.
sentences.chinese: 人直接食用海帶攝取的營養物質和海帶多糖的量極少。

sentences.english: Beth kept on, with only slight relapses into idleness or grieving.
sentences.chinese: 只有貝思堅持不懈，極少躲懶或悲天憫人。

sentences.english: This is one of those rare cases.
sentences.chinese: 本案屬於那種極少數案例之一。

sentences.english: If any "Fulcrums" saw combat, their numbers were extremely small.
sentences.chinese: 如果有任何“支點”看到作戰，他們的人數極少。

sentences.english: Then there are the few brae souls who grab at its horns and hang on at all costs.
sentences.chinese: 只有極少數的靈魂不畏艱險，不惜一切。

sentences.english: Harmonious here dominant is worn everything, be being mixed spicily seldom appear caustically.
sentences.chinese: 和睦在這裏主導着一切，諷刺和挖苦是極少出現的。

sentences.english: A fiver subcapsular hematoma is an extremely are complication of ESWL.
sentences.chinese: 肝臟被膜下血腫是此一手術極少見的併發症。

sentences.english: Dingoes are one of their few enemies.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亞野犬是袋鼠極少數的敵人之一。

sentences.english: Pneumonic form of plague is the most virulent and least common form of plague.
sentences.chinese: 肺鼠疫是鼠疫的最致命和極少見的類型。

sentences.english: Historically, most societies granted rights only to the lucky few.
sentences.chinese: 回顧歷史，大多數社會只讓極少數幸運者享有權利。

sentences.english: However, we find these circumstances to be rare.
sentences.chinese: 然而，我們發現這樣的情況只是極少數。

sentences.english: Today, only a very small number of museums have examples of original chopines.
sentences.chinese: 如今，只有極少的博物館有最早的軟木高底鞋收藏。

sentences.english: In rare cases, the intestine perforates and the infant dies.
sentences.chinese: 極少數的個案，出現腸道出現穿孔而導致死亡。

sentences.english: Few expect the ECB to cut interest rates soon.
sentences.chinese: 極少有人預期歐洲央行將很快降低利率。

sentences.english: Very few foreign sales this month, the price is only an empty peg.
sentences.chinese: 本月外銷量極少，價格僅是空掛。

definition: rare/not familiar (to the speaker)/sth rarely experience/hard to see
can be counted on one's fingers (idiom)/very few
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
